queries.team: SELECT Account.Name, CreatedDate, Contact.Name, Owner.Name, Owner.Alias, Product__r.Name, Severity__c, Status, Subject, Description, CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Id, lastModifiedDate FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND Product__r.Name IN ({product_name}) AND Owner.Name IN ('Support_Americas', 'Escalation_Group', 'MCS') ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC
queries.personal: SELECT Account.Name, CreatedDate, Contact.Name, Owner.Name, Owner.Alias, Product__r.Name, Severity__c, Status, Subject, Description, CaseNumber, Time_Before_Next_Update_Commitment__c, Id, lastModifiedDate FROM Case WHERE Status_Closed__c = FALSE AND Owner.Name LIKE '%{engineer_name}%' ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC
queries.opened_today: SELECT CaseNumber, Product__r.Name FROM Case WHERE CreatedDate = TODAY AND Product__r.Name IN ({product_name})
